CheckTitle: Checks if IAM groups have users associated with them. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if an IAM group has no users associated.
Description: Checks if IAM groups have users associated with them. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if an IAM group has no users associated.
Risk: IAM groups without users might indicate misconfiguration or unused resources that should be reviewed and cleaned up.

Recommendation.Text: Ensure that IAM groups have users associated with them
